<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#H80068tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 91%; margin-left: 4%"><!-- BEGIN PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak End -->

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    all outstanding Options shall fully vest upon the
    Participant&#146;s Involuntary Termination or Voluntary
    Termination with Cause occurring on or after a Change of
    Control. Such newly vested Options shall be fully exercisable as
    of the date of the Involuntary Termination or Voluntary
    Termination with Cause on or after a Change of Control occurs.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (b)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    Without further action by the Committee or the Board,
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    all unvested Restricted Stock Awards and Restricted Stock Units
    shall fully vest upon the Participant&#146;s Involuntary
    Termination or Voluntary Termination with Cause occurring on or
    after a Change of Control. Such newly vested Restricted Stock
    Units shall be converted to Stock and the Participant shall be
    issued the requisite number of shares, after any withholding
    under Section&#160;11, as soon as administratively practicable
    after the Involuntary Termination or Voluntary Termination with
    Cause on or after a Change of Control occurs, unless the
    Participant had elected to defer Restricted Stock Units to the
    Deferred Delivery Plan in which case the Participant&#146;s
    account in the Deferred Delivery Plan shall be credited with
    deferred Restricted Stock Units as of the date of the
    Involuntary Termination or Voluntary Termination with Cause on
    or after the Change of Control occurs.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (c)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    Assuming the achievement of a Performance Goal, the entitlement
    to receive cash and Stock under any outstanding Performance
    Award grants shall vest automatically, without further action by
    the Committee or the Board, and shall become payable as follows:
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="9%"></TD>
    <TD width="5%"></TD>
    <TD width="86%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (i)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    If such Change of Control occurs subsequent to the achievement
    of a Performance Goal, any remainder of such payout amount shall
    vest as of the date of the Participant&#146;s Involuntary
    Termination or Voluntary Termination with Cause occurring on or
    after the date of such Change of Control and shall be paid by
    the Company to the Participant within thirty (30)&#160;days of
    the date of such Involuntary Termination or Voluntary
    Termination with Cause which occurs on or after the date of the
    Change of Control in the manner set out in subsection 12.1
    hereof.
</TD>
</TR>


<TR style="line-height: 6pt; font-size: 1pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>


<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (ii)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    If the achievement of a Performance Goal occurs subsequent to
    the date of a Change of Control, the applicable payout amount
    shall vest in full for which the Performance Period has not yet
    ended as of the date of the Participant&#146;s Involuntary
    Termination or Voluntary Termination with Cause occurring on or
    after such Change of Control and shall be paid by the Company to
    the Participant within thirty (30)&#160;days after the later of
    (1)&#160;the date of the Participant&#146;s Involuntary
    Termination or Voluntary Termination with Cause or (2)&#160;the
    date that the Performance Goal is reached. The payment will
    occur only if the Participant is employed at the time that the
    Performance Goal is reached or if the Performance Goal is
    reached after the Participant&#146;s Involuntary Termination or
    Voluntary Termination with Cause occurring on or after the
    Change of Control.
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (d)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    To the extent that any Award is subject to Internal Revenue Code
    Section&#160;409A, the Award shall contain appropriate
    provisions to comply with Internal Revenue Code
    Section&#160;409A, which shall supersede the provisions of
    subsections (a), (b), and (c).
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 18pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Section&#160;13<BR>
    </FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Reorganization
    or Liquidation
    </FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    In the event that the Company is merged or consolidated with
    another corporation and the Company is not the surviving
    corporation, or if all or substantially all of the assets or
    more than 20&#160;percent of the outstanding voting stock of the
    Company is acquired by any other corporation, business entity or
</DIV>
<!-- XBRL Paragraph Pagebreak -->
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak Begin -->

<P align="center" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <BR>
    B-20
</DIV><!-- END PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#H80068tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 91%; margin-left: 4%"><!-- BEGIN PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak End -->

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    person, or in case of a reorganization (other than a
    reorganization under the United States Bankruptcy Code) or
    liquidation of the Company, then the Committee, or the board of
    directors of any corporation assuming the obligations of the
    Company, shall, as to the Plan and outstanding Awards make
    appropriate provision for the adoption and continuation of the
    Plan by the acquiring or successor corporation and for the
    protection of any holders of such outstanding Awards by the
    substitution on an equitable basis of appropriate stock of the
    Company or of the merged, consolidated, or otherwise reorganized
    corporation which will be issuable with respect to the Stock.
    Additionally, upon the occurrence of such an event and provided
    that a Performance Goal has occurred, upon written notice to the
    Participants, the Committee may accelerate the vesting and
    payment dates of the entitlement to receive cash and Stock under
    outstanding Awards so that all such existing entitlements are
    paid prior to any such event. If a Performance Goal has not yet
    been attained, the Committee in its discretion may make
    equitable payment or adjustment.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    In its discretion, and on such terms and conditions as it deems
    appropriate, the Committee may provide, either by the terms of
    an agreement applicable to any Award or by resolution adopted
    prior to the occurrence of a Change of Control or an event
    described in this Section&#160;13, that any outstanding Award
    (or portion thereof) shall be converted into a right to receive
    cash, on or as soon as practicable following the closing date or
    expiration date of the transaction resulting in the Change of
    Control or such event in an amount equal to the highest value of
    the consideration to be received in connection with such
    transaction for one share of Stock, or, if higher, the highest
    Fair Market Value of a share of Stock during the thirty
    (30)&#160;consecutive business days immediately prior to the
    closing date or expiration date of such transaction, less the
    per-share Option Price or grant price of SARs, as applicable to
    the Award, multiplied by the number of shares subject to such
    Award, or the applicable portion thereof.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 18pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Section&#160;14<BR>
    </FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Rights of
    Employees and Participants
    </FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    14.1&#160;<I><U>Employment</U>.</I>&#160;&#160;Neither anything
    contained in the Plan or any agreement nor the granting of any
    Award under the Plan shall confer upon any Participant any right
    with respect to the continuation of his or her employment by the
    Company or any Affiliate, or interfere in any way with the right
    of the Company or any Affiliate, at any time, to terminate such
    employment or to increase or decrease the level of the
    Participant&#146;s compensation from the level in existence at
    the time of the Award.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    An Eligible Person who has been granted an Award in one year
    shall not necessarily be entitled to be granted Awards in
    subsequent years.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    14.2&#160;<I><U>Non-transferability</U>.</I>&#160;&#160;Except
    as otherwise determined at any time by the Committee as to any
    Awards other than ISOs, no right or interest of any Participant
    in an Award granted pursuant to the Plan shall be assignable or
    transferable during the lifetime of the Participant, either
    voluntarily or involuntarily, or subjected to any lien, directly
    or indirectly, by operation of law, or otherwise, including
    execution, levy, garnishment, attachment, pledge, bankruptcy, or
    court order; <U>provided</U> that the Committee may permit
    further transferability of Awards other than ISOs, on a general
    or a specific basis, and may impose conditions and limitations
    on any permitted transferability, subject to any applicable
    Restriction Period; <U>provided</U> <U>further</U>,
    <U>however</U>, that no Award may be transferred for value or
    other consideration without first obtaining approval thereof by
    the stockholders of the Company. In the event of a
    Participant&#146;s death, a Participant&#146;s rights and
    interests in any Award as set forth in an Award agreement, shall
    be transferable by testamentary will or the laws of descent and
    distribution, or, with respect to Awards other than Incentive
    Stock Options, a beneficiary designation
</DIV>
<!-- XBRL Paragraph Pagebreak -->
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak Begin -->

<P align="center" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <BR>
    B-21
</DIV><!-- END PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#H80068tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 91%; margin-left: 4%"><!-- BEGIN PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak End -->

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    that is in a form approved by the Committee and in compliance
    with the provisions of this Plan, applicable law, and the
    applicable Award agreement, and payment of any entitlements due
    under the Plan shall be made to the Participant&#146;s
    designated beneficiary, legal representatives, heirs, or
    legatees, as applicable. If in the opinion of the Committee a
    person entitled to payments or to exercise rights with respect
    to the Plan is disabled from caring for his or her affairs
    because of mental condition, physical condition, or age, payment
    due such person may be made to, and such rights shall be
    exercised by, such person&#146;s guardian, conservator, or other
    legal personal representative upon furnishing the Committee with
    evidence satisfactory to the Committee of such status. If any
    individual entitled to payment or to exercise rights with
    respect to the Plan is a minor, the Committee shall cause the
    payment to be made to (or the right to be exercised by) the
    custodian or representative who, under the state law of the
    minor&#146;s domicile, is authorized to act on behalf of the
    minor or is authorized to receive funds on behalf of the minor.
    With respect to those Awards, if any, that are permitted to be
    transferred to another individual, references in the Plan to
    exercise or payment related to such Awards by or to the
    Participant shall be deemed to include, as determined by the
    Committee, the Participant&#146;s permitted transferee. A
    Participant&#146;s unexercised Option or SAR, or amounts due but
    remaining unpaid to such Participant, at the Participant&#146;s
    death, shall be exercised or paid as designated by the
    Participant by will or by the laws of descent and distribution,
    or, with respect to any unexercised Option or SAR other than an
    Incentive Stock Option, in accordance with the
    Participant&#146;s beneficiary designation in a form approved by
    the Committee and in compliance with the provisions of this
    Plan, applicable law and the applicable Award agreement. In the
    event any Award is exercised by or otherwise paid to the
    executors, administrators, heirs or distributees of the estate
    of a deceased Participant, or the transferee or designated
    beneficiary of an Award, in any such case, pursuant to the terms
    and conditions of the Plan and the applicable Award agreement
    and in accordance with such terms and conditions as may be
    specified from time to time by the Committee, the Company shall
    be under no obligation to issue shares of Stock thereunder
    unless and until the Company is satisfied, as determined in the
    discretion of the Committee, that the person or persons
    exercising such Award, or to receive such payment, are the duly
    appointed legal representative of the deceased
    Participant&#146;s estate or the proper legatees or distributees
    thereof, or the valid transferee or designated beneficiary of
    such Award, as applicable. Any purported assignment, transfer or
    encumbrance of an Award that does not comply with this
    Section&#160;14.2 shall be void and unenforceable against the
    Company.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    14.3&#160;<I><U>Noncompliance with Internal Revenue Code
    Section&#160;409A</U>.</I>&#160;&#160;If an Award is subject to
    the requirements of Internal Revenue Code Section&#160;409A, to
    the extent that the Company or an Affiliate takes any action
    that causes a violation of Internal Revenue Code
    Section&#160;409A or fails to take reasonable actions required
    to comply with Internal Revenue Code Section&#160;409A, in each
    case as determined by the Committee, the Company shall pay an
    additional amount to the Participant (or beneficiary) equal to
    the additional income tax imposed pursuant to Internal Revenue
    Code Section&#160;409A on the Participant as a result of such
    violation, plus any taxes imposed on this additional payment.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 18pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Section&#160;15<BR>
    </FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Other
    Employee Benefits
    </FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    The amount of any income deemed to be received by a Participant
    as a result of the payment under an Award or exercise shall not
    constitute &#147;earnings&#148; or &#147;compensation&#148; with
    respect to which any other employee benefits of such Participant
    are determined, including without limitation benefits under any
    pension, profit sharing, life insurance, or salary continuation
    plan.
</DIV>
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak Begin -->

<P align="center" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <BR>
    B-22
</DIV><!-- END PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#H80068tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 91%; margin-left: 4%"><!-- BEGIN PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak End -->

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Section&#160;16<BR>
    </FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Amendment,
    Modification, and Termination
    </FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    The Committee or the Board may at any time terminate, and from
    time to time may amend or modify the Plan, and the Committee or
    the Board may, to the extent permitted by the Plan, from time to
    time amend or modify the terms of any Award theretofore granted,
    including any Award agreement, in each case, retroactively or
    prospectively; <U>provided</U>, <U>however</U>, that no
    amendment or modification of the Plan may become effective
    without approval of the amendment or modification by the
    Company&#146;s stockholders if stockholder approval is required
    to enable the Plan to satisfy an applicable statutory or
    regulatory requirements, unless the Company, on the advice of
    outside counsel, determines that stockholder approval is not
    necessary.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    Notwithstanding any other provision of this Plan, no amendment,
    modification, or termination of the Plan or any Award shall
    adversely affect the previously accrued material rights or
    benefits of a Participant under any outstanding Award
    theretofore awarded under the Plan, without the consent of such
    Participant holding such Award, except to the extent necessary
    to avoid a violation of Internal Revenue Code Section&#160;409A
    or the Board or the Committee determines, on advice of outside
    counsel or the Company&#146;s independent accountants, that such
    amendment or modification is required for the Company, the Plan,
    or the Award to satisfy, comply with, or meet the requirements
    of any law, regulation, listing rule, or accounting standard
    applicable to the Company.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    The Committee shall have the authority to adopt (without the
    necessity for further stockholder approval) such modifications,
    procedures, and subplans as may be necessary or desirable to
    comply with the provisions of the laws (including, but not
    limited to, tax laws and regulations) of countries other than
    the United States in which the Company may operate, so as to
    assure the viability of the benefits of the Plan to Participants
    employed in such countries.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 18pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Section&#160;17<BR>
    </FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Requirements
    of Law
    </FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    17.1&#160;<I><U>Requirements of Law</U>.</I>&#160;&#160;The
    issuance of Stock and the payment of cash pursuant to the Plan
    shall be subject to all applicable laws, rules, and regulations,
    including applicable federal and state securities laws. The
    Company may require a Participant, as a condition of receiving
    payment under an Award, to give written assurances in substance
    and form satisfactory to the Company and its counsel to such
    effect as the Company deems necessary or appropriate in order to
    comply with federal and applicable state securities laws.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    17.2&#160;<I><U>Section&#160;409A of the
    Code</U>.</I>&#160;&#160;It is intended that this Plan shall
    comply with the provisions of, or an exemption from, Internal
    Revenue Code Section&#160;409A and the Treasury regulations
    relating thereto. Awards are intended to be exempt from Internal
    Revenue Code Section&#160;409A to the extent possible. Any Award
    or payment that qualifies for an exemption shall be considered
    as the first payment(s) made under the Plan. For purposes of the
    limitations on nonqualified deferred compensation under Internal
    Revenue Code Section&#160;409A, each payment of compensation
    under this Plan shall be treated as a separate payment of
    compensation for purposes of applying the deferral election
    rules and the exemption for certain short-term deferral amounts
    under Internal Revenue Code Section&#160;409A. In no event may
    the Participant, directly or indirectly, designate the calendar
    year of any payment subject to Internal Revenue Code
    Section&#160;409A under this Plan.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I><U>Six-month Delay for Specified
    Participants</U>.</I>&#160;&#160;Notwithstanding any other
    provision of this Plan, to the extent that the right to any
    payment (including the provision of benefits) hereunder provides
    for the
</DIV>
<!-- XBRL Paragraph Pagebreak -->
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak Begin -->

<P align="center" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <BR>
    B-23
</DIV><!-- END PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#H80068tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 91%; margin-left: 4%"><!-- BEGIN PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak End -->

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    &#147;deferral of compensation&#148; within the meaning of
    Internal Revenue Code Section&#160;409A(d)(1), the payment shall
    be paid (or provided) in accordance with the following: If the
    Participant is a &#147;Specified Employee&#148; within the
    meaning of Internal Revenue Code Section&#160;409A(a)(2)(B)(i)
    on the date of the Participant&#146;s Separation from Service
    (the &#147;<U>Separation Date</U>&#148;), and if an exemption
    from the six (6)&#160;month delay requirement of Internal
    Revenue Code Section&#160;409A(a)(2)(B)(i) is not available,
    then no such payment shall be made or commence during the period
    beginning on the Separation Date and ending on the date that is
    six months following the Separation Date or, if earlier, on the
    date of the Participant&#146;s death. The amount of any payment
    that would otherwise be paid to the Participant during this
    period shall instead be paid to the Participant on the first day
    of the first calendar month following the end of the period.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I><U>Prohibition on Acceleration</U>.</I>&#160;&#160;Unless a
    payment is exempt from Internal Revenue Code Section&#160;409A,
    the date of payment may not be accelerated and any payment made
    pursuant to the termination and liquidation of the Plan shall
    not be accelerated except in compliance with Internal Revenue
    Code Section&#160;409A generally and Treasury Regulation
    &#167;&#160;1.409A-3(j)(4)(ix) specifically.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    17.3&#160;<I><U>Section&#160;16
    Requirements</U>.</I>&#160;&#160;If a Participant is an officer
    or director of the Company within the meaning of Section&#160;16
    of the Exchange Act, Awards granted hereunder shall be subject
    to all conditions required under
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Rule&#160;16b-3,</FONT>
    or any successor rule(s) promulgated under the Exchange Act, to
    qualify the Award for any exemption from the provisions of
    Section&#160;16 available under such Rule. Such conditions are
    hereby incorporated herein by reference and shall be set forth
    in the agreement with the Participant, which describes the Award.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    17.4&#160;<I><U>Governing Law</U>.</I>&#160;&#160;The Plan and
    all agreements hereunder shall be construed in accordance with
    and governed by the laws of the State of Texas.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 18pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Section&#160;18<BR>
    </FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Duration of
    the Plan
    </FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    The Plan shall terminate on the ten year anniversary of the
    Effective Date. No grants shall be awarded after such
    termination; however, the terms of the Plan shall continue to
    apply to all Awards outstanding when the Plan terminates.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    Dated: February&#160;10, 2011; Effective May&#160;5, 2011.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 10pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 49%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    APACHE CORPORATION
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 32pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

    Senior Vice President,
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 53%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    Human Resources
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    ATTEST:
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 32pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    Cheri L. Peper

    Corporate Secretary
</DIV>
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak Begin -->

<P align="center" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <BR>
    B-24
</DIV><!-- END PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#H80068tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 91%; margin-left: 4%"><!-- BEGIN PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak End -->

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 18pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">APACHE
    CORPORATION 2011 OMNIBUS EQUITY COMPENSATION PLAN<BR>
    UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT></FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    This Schedule (the <B>&#147;UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan&#148;</FONT></B>)
    shall require HMRC approval under paragraph&#160;28 of
    Schedule&#160;4. Options granted under the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT>
    shall be governed by the provisions of the Apache Corporation
    2011 Omnibus Equity Compensation Plan (the
    <B>&#147;Plan&#148;</B>), subject to the amendments and
    additions set out below.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <B>1.&#160;Purpose of the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    The purpose of the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT> is
    to enable tax advantaged Options to be granted to Eligible
    Employees (as defined below) in the United Kingdom. In the event
    of any conflict between the Plan and the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan,</FONT>
    the provisions of the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT>
    shall prevail in respect to Options granted under the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan.</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <B>2.&#160;Definitions and Interpretation</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    2.1&#160;Capitalised terms used in the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT>
    shall have the meanings given to them in the Plan, except where
    defined below, when they shall have the meanings given to them
    below, or where expressly disapplied under 2.2 below.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I>&#147;Act&#148; </I>means the Income Tax (Earnings and
    Pensions) Act 2003 of the United Kingdom;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I>&#147;Approved Market Value&#148; </I>means the per share
    closing price of the Stock as quoted on the New York Stock
    Exchange, Inc. Composite Transactions Reporting System for a
    particular date or, if the Stock is not so quoted at any time,
    either (a)&#160;the market value of a share of the Stock as
    determined in accordance with the provisions of part&#160;VIII
    Taxation of Chargeable Gains Act 1992 of the United Kingdom and
    agreed for the purposes of the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT>
    with Shares&#160;Valuation of HMRC on or before that date; or
    (b)&#160;the market value of a share of the Stock as agreed for
    the purposes of the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT>
    with Shares and Assets Valuation of HMRC in advance of that
    date. Where necessary, the market value of a share of the Stock
    shall be converted from US&#160;Dollars into Pounds Sterling at
    the closing exchange rate on the Date of Grant taken from the
    Wall Street Journal;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I>&#147;Associated Company&#148; </I>has the meaning assigned
    to it in paragraph&#160;35(1) of Schedule&#160;4;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I>&#147;Control&#148; </I>has the meaning given to it by
    Section&#160;840 of the Income and Corporation Taxes Act 1988
    and <I>&#147;Controlled&#148; </I>shall be construed accordingly;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I>&#147;Eligible Employee&#148; </I>means any director of a
    Participating Company who is required to devote to his duties
    not less than 25&#160;hours per week (excluding meal breaks) or
    any employee (other than one who is a director) of any
    Participating Company;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I>&#147;HMRC&#148; </I>means Her Majesty&#146;s
    Revenue&#160;&#038; Customs of the United Kingdom;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I>&#147;Option&#148; </I>means a stock option granted under the
    UK <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT>
    to a Participant to acquire Shares in accordance with the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT> as
    evidenced by the issue of a Stock Option Agreement;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I>&#147;Optionholder&#148; </I>means the holder of an Option;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I>&#147;Participant&#148; </I>means an Eligible Employee who
    has been granted an Option under the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan;</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I>&#147;Participating Companies&#148; </I>are the Company and
    all subsidiaries which are Controlled by the Company, which have
    been nominated by the Committee to participate for the time
    being in the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan;</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak Begin -->

<P align="center" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <BR>
    B-25
</DIV><!-- END PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#H80068tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 91%; margin-left: 4%"><!-- BEGIN PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak End -->

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I>&#147;Schedule&#160;4&#148; </I>means Schedule&#160;4 to the
    Act;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I>&#147;Share&#148; </I>means a share of
    U.S.&#160;$0.625&#160;par value common stock of the Company
    which complies with provisions of paragraphs&#160;16 to 20 of
    Schedule&#160;4;&#160;and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <I>&#147;UK Companies Act&#148; </I>means the Companies Act 2006
    of the United Kingdom.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    2.2&#160;The following definitions set out in the Plan under
    Section&#160;2.1 shall not apply to Options granted under this
    UK <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan:</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (a)&#160;&#147;Affiliate&#148;.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    2.3&#160;References to Paragraphs, unless otherwise indicated,
    are references to paragraphs of this UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT> and
    references to Sections are references to Sections of the Plan.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    2.4&#160;The following words in the Plan shall not apply to
    Options granted under the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan,</FONT>
    wherever they appear:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (a)&#160;&#147;settled&#148;;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (b)&#160;&#147;cancelled&#148;;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (c)&#160;&#147;forfeited&#148;;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (d)&#160;&#147;or surrendered&#148;,
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (e)&#160;&#147;Internal Revenue Code Section&#160;409A&#148;.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <B>3.&#160;Grant of Options</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    3.1&#160;Only Options may be granted under the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan.</FONT>
    For the avoidance of doubt, all references to &#147;Incentive
    Stock Options&#148;, &#147;Performance Awards and Goals&#148;,
    &#147;Restricted Stock&#148;, &#147;Stock Appreciation
    Right&#148;, &#147;Bonus Stock and Awards in lieu of
    Obligations&#148;, &#147;Deferred Delivery Plan&#148;,
    &#147;Dividend Equivalents&#148;, and &#147;cash&#148; shall be
    ignored for the purposes of the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan.</FONT>
    The following provisions of the Plan shall not apply to Options
    granted under the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan:</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (a)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    Section&#160;6.2(i) (Repricing Prohibited);&#160;and
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (b)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    Sections&#160;11.2(a) to (c) (Withholding
    Requirement&#160;&#151; Stock Options and SARs) from the
    paragraph &#147;At the time the Committee grants an Option&#148;
    to the end of
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">sub-clause</FONT>
    (c).
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    3.2&#160;Only Eligible Employees may participate in the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan.</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    3.3&#160;In no event shall the Option Price be less than
    Approved Market Value on the date the Option is granted.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    3.4&#160;While the Committee may grant Options subject to terms
    and conditions as described in Section 9.1, such conditions must
    be stated at the time the Option is granted. Any performance
    conditions must be objective and may be waived or amended if an
    event happens which causes the Committee, acting fairly and
    reasonably, to consider that the performance conditions could
    not be fairly or reasonably met, provided that any amended
    performance condition should be no more difficult to satisfy
    than the original condition.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    3.5&#160;The number of Shares over which an Option may be
    granted to any Eligible Employee shall be limited and take
    effect so that the aggregate Approved Market Value at the
    relevant dates of grant of Shares over which Options have been
    granted and are outstanding at any time under the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT> and
    under any other HMRC approved discretionary share option plan
    operated by the Company or by any Associated Company shall not
    exceed &#163;30,000 (or such other amount as may from time to
    time be permitted under paragraph&#160;6(1) of Schedule&#160;4).
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak Begin -->

<P align="center" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <BR>
    B-26
</DIV><!-- END PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#H80068tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 91%; margin-left: 4%"><!-- BEGIN PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- XBRL Pagebreak End -->

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    3.6&#160;No Option will be granted to an Eligible Employee under
    the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT> if
    at that time the Eligible Employee is excluded from
    participating in the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT> by
    virtue of paragraph&#160;9 of Schedule&#160;4.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <B>4.&#160;Exercise of Options</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    4.1&#160;Upon exercise of an Option, the Company shall allot or
    transfer Shares to the Participant within 30&#160;days of the
    date such an Option is exercised. The Shares shall rank pari
    passu with other issued Shares of the same class and shall be
    acquired subject to the Company&#146;s statutes and bylaws.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    4.2&#160;Upon the exercise of an Option, payment may be made in
    one of the ways specified in Section 6.2(g)(iv)(A), (B)&#160;or
    (E); provided that any broker arrangement made for the purposes
    of (E)&#160;must have been previously agreed with HMRC.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    4.3&#160;The date of exercise shall be the date the Company
    receives a written notice of exercise together with the
    aggregate Option Price in accordance with the Stock Option
    Agreement. The Participant&#146;s obligation to deliver written
    notice of exercise is satisfied by electronic delivery of such
    notice pursuant to Section&#160;6.2(g)(i). For the avoidance of
    doubt, the Option Price may not be paid on the exercise of an
    Option in instalments or in the form of shares or other
    securities.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    4.4&#160;Notwithstanding Section&#160;11.1, a Participant will
    be given the opportunity to pay any tax and social security
    withholding from his own resources either by deduction from
    salary or other means.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    4.5&#160;No Option may be exercised by the Participant if at
    that time the Participant is excluded from participating in the
    UK <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT>
    by virtue of paragraph&#160;9 of Schedule&#160;4.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    4.6&#160;Notwithstanding Section&#160;6.2(f), if a Participant
    dies,
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">his/her</FONT>
    personal representative or the beneficiaries of the
    Participant&#146;s estate may exercise the Option for a period
    of up to 12&#160;months following the Participant&#146;s death.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    4.7&#160;In the exercise of any discretion the Committee may
    have to determine an Optionholder&#146;s right of exercise or to
    accelerate the vesting of Options, the Committee will at all
    times act fairly and reasonably.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <B>5.&#160;Adjustments or Reductions of Option Price</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    5.1&#160;For the purposes of the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan,</FONT> no
    adjustment pursuant to Section&#160;4.4 shall be made to any
    Option which has been granted under the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT>
    unless such adjustment would be permitted under
    paragraph&#160;22 of Schedule&#160;4 and where so permitted no
    such adjustment shall take effect until such alteration or
    amendment has been approved by HMRC. For the avoidance of doubt,
    the following pursuant to Section&#160;4.4 would not be
    permitted under paragraph&#160;22 of Schedule&#160;4 to any
    Option which has been granted under the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan:</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (a)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    &#147;the payment of a Stock dividend or any other distribution
    upon such shares payable in Stock&#148;;
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (b)&#160;a &#147;combination, reclassification...involving the
    Stock&#148;;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (c)&#160;any adjustments involving other property (including
    cash);&#160;and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (d)&#160;the Performance Goals and the individual limits
    applicable to Awards.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    For the avoidance of doubt, Paragraph&#160;22 of Schedule&#160;4
    only permits adjustments to:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="9%"></TD>
    <TD width="5%"></TD>
    <TD width="86%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (i)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    the number of Shares;
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="9%"></TD>
    <TD width="5%"></TD>
    <TD width="86%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (ii)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    the Option Price;&#160;and
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (iii)&#160;the description of the Shares awarded under the Plan.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <B>6.&#160;Disapplication of other provisions under the Plan</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    6.1&#160;The following provisions of the Plan shall not apply to
    Options granted under the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan.</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (a)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    In Section&#160;4.4 (Adjustments for Stock Split, Stock
    Dividend, Etc.), the words: &#147;or change in any way the
    rights and privileges of such shares by means of the payment of
    a Stock dividend or any other distribution upon such shares
    payable in Stock,&#148; and the words &#147;combination,
    reclassification&#148; and the words &#147;rights and
    privileges&#148; in the eighth line of Section&#160;4.4;
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (b)&#160;Section&#160;4.5 (Other Changes in Stock);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (c)&#160;Section&#160;4.6 (Rights to Subscribe);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>

    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (d)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    In Section&#160;4.7 (General Adjustment Rules), the words
    &#147;or substitution&#148; and substitution or&#148; wherever
    they appear;
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (e)&#160;Section&#160;8.7 (Dividend Equivalents);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (f)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    In Section&#160;11.1 (Withholding Requirement) the words
    &#147;or other property&#148;;
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>

</TD>
    <TD align="left">

    &#147;any transaction involving an Award&#148;, which shall be
    substituted for the words &#147;an Option&#148;;
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>

    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>

</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    In Section&#160;11.2 (Withholding Requirement&#160;&#151; Stock
    Options and SARS)
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">sub-clauses&#160;(a)</FONT>
    and (b);
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (i)&#160;In Section&#160;12 (Change of Control)
    clauses&#160;12.1(b), (c)&#160;and (d);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    (j)&#160;In Section&#160;13 (Reorganization or Liquidation), the
    words:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    &#147;the Committee, or the board of directors of any
    corporation assuming the obligations of the Company, shall, as
    to the Plan and outstanding Options make appropriate provision
    for the adoption and continuation of the Plan by the acquiring
    or successor corporation and for the protection of any such
    outstanding Options by the substitution on an equitable basis of
    appropriate stock of the Company or of the merged, consolidated
    or otherwise reorganized corporation which will be issuable with
    respect to the Stock. Additionally,&#148;.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    6.2&#160;Section&#160;14.2 (Non-Transferability) shall be
    deleted entirely and replaced with the following:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 4%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    &#147;Except for the transmission of an Option on the death of
    an Optionholder to his personal representatives or to the
    beneficiaries of his estate, neither an Option nor any rights in
    respect of it may be transferred, assigned or otherwise disposed
    of by an Optionholder to any other person.&#148;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <B>7.&#160;Withholding</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    7.1&#160;For the avoidance of doubt, notwithstanding
    Section&#160;11.2(c) of the Plan, the Participant shall retain
    the beneficial ownership of all the Shares
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">he/she</FONT> was
    entitled to acquire following exercise of
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">his/her</FONT>
    Option until they are subsequently sold.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <B>8.&#160;Exchange of Options</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    8.1&#160;This Paragraph&#160;8 applies if a company (the
    &#147;<B>Acquiring Company</B>&#148;):
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (a)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    obtains Control of the Company as a result of making a general
    offer to acquire:
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="9%"></TD>
    <TD width="5%"></TD>
    <TD width="86%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (i)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    the whole of the ordinary issued shares of common stock in the
    capital of the Company (other than that which is already owned
    by it and its subsidiary or holding
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

    <TD width="9%"></TD>
    <TD width="5%"></TD>

    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
     company) made on a condition such that, if satisfied, the
    Acquiring Company will have Control of the Company;&#160;or
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="9%"></TD>
    <TD width="5%"></TD>
    <TD width="86%"></TD>
