</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    all the Shares (or those Shares not already owned by the
    Acquiring Company or its subsidiary or holding company);&#160;or
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (b)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    obtains Control of the Company under a compromise or arrangement
    sanctioned by the court under the Delaware statutory equivalent
    of section&#160;899 of the UK Companies Act and agreed in
    advance by HMRC to be equivalent;&#160;or
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (c)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    becomes bound or entitled to acquire Shares under the Delaware
    Statutory equivalent of sections&#160;974 to 989 of the UK
    Companies Act and agreed in advance by HMRC to be equivalent.
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    8.2&#160;On the occurrence of any of the events described in
    Paragraph&#160;8.1, a Participant may, during the period
    specified in Paragraph&#160;8.3 below, agree with the Acquiring
    Company to release his Option (&#147;<B>Old Option</B>&#148;) in
    consideration of the grant to him of a new option (&#147;<B>New
    Option</B>&#148;). The New Option must be equivalent to the Old
    Option within the meaning of paragraph&#160;27(4) of
    Schedule&#160;4. It will be an option to acquire shares in the
    Acquiring Company or some other company falling within
    paragraph&#160;16(b) or paragraph&#160;16(c) of Schedule&#160;4.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    8.3&#160;The period referred to in Paragraph&#160;8.2 is:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (a)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    in a case falling within Paragraph&#160;8.1(a), 6&#160;months
    starting with the time when the Acquiring Company obtains
    Control of the Company and any condition subject to which the
    offer is made is satisfied;
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (b)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    in a case falling within Paragraph&#160;8.1(b), 6&#160;months
    starting with the time when the court sanctions the compromise
    or arrangement;
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (c)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    in a case falling within Paragraph&#160;8.1(c), the period
    during which the Acquiring Company remains so bound or entitled.
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    8.4&#160;Where a Participant is granted a New Option for release
    of his Old Option as described in this Paragraph&#160;8, then
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (a)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    the New Option will be treated as having been acquired at the
    same time as the Old Option and be exercisable in the same
    manner and at the same time as the Old Option;
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (b)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    the New Option will be subject to the provisions of the Plan and
    this UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT> as
    it had effect in relation to the Old Option immediately before
    the release;&#160;and
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<TR>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="4%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>    (c)&#160;
</TD>
    <TD align="left">
    with effect from the release and grant, the provisions of the
    Plan and the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT>
    will be construed, in relation to the New Option, as if
    references to Shares were references to shares over which the
    New Option is granted, and references to the Company were
    references to the Acquiring Company. However, for the purpose of
    references to Participating Company, the Company will continue
    to be Apache Corporation.
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <B>9.&#160;Amendments</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV align="left"><FONT size="1">

</FONT></DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    9.1&#160;Notwithstanding Section&#160;16, no alterations or
    amendments to any provision of the Plan or the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT>
    where such shall take effect in relation to Options granted or
    to be granted under the UK
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Sub-Plan</FONT> may
    be made until such alteration or amendment has been approved by
    HMRC, unless the relevant provision is not necessary in order to
    meet the requirements of Schedule 4.
</DIV>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 12pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>APACHE CORPORATION</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Thursday, May&nbsp;5, 2011<BR>
10:00&nbsp;a.m.</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Hilton Houston Post Oak<BR>
2001 Post Oak Boulevard<BR>
Houston, Texas</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>Important Notice Regarding Internet Availability of Proxy Materials for this Annual Meeting:</B><BR>
The Notice and Proxy Statement and Annual Report are available at<BR>
http://www.apachecorp.com/Investors/Annual&#95;meeting.aspx
</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>APACHE CORPORATION &#151; 2011 PROXY</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>This proxy is solicited on behalf of the board of directors for use<BR>
at the Annual Meeting on May&nbsp;5, 2011</B>
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">By signing this proxy, you revoke all prior proxies and appoint Frederick M. Bohen, George D.
Lawrence and Charles J. Pitman as Proxies, with full power of substitution, and authorize them to
represent the undersigned at the annual meeting of stockholders to be held May&nbsp;5, 2011, or any
adjournment thereof, and to vote all the shares of common stock of Apache Corporation held of
record by the undersigned on March&nbsp;7, 2011.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">This Proxy, when properly executed, will be voted in the manner directed by the undersigned
stockholder. IF NO DIRECTION IS GIVEN, THIS PROXY WILL BE VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; THE ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
(PROPOSALS 1 THROUGH 4), &#147;FOR&#148; PROPOSALS 5, 6, 8, 9 and 10, AND &#147;1 YEAR&#148; FOR PROPOSAL 7.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">For participants in the Apache 401(k) Savings Plan, this proxy, when properly executed, will be
voted in the manner directed by the undersigned. If no direction is given, if the card is not
signed, or if the card is not received by May&nbsp;2, 2011, the shares credited to your account will be
voted in proportion to directions received by Fidelity, the plan trustee.
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 14pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>Vote by Internet, Telephone or Mail<BR>
24 Hours a Day, 7 Days a Week</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 12pt; margin-top: 6pt">Your phone or Internet vote authorizes the named proxies to vote your shares<BR>
in the same manner as if you marked, signed and returned your proxy card.
</DIV>
<DIV align="center">

    <TD align="center" valign="top">Identification Number for this account.</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="center" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD align="center" valign="top">Follow the simple instructions
</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="center" valign="top">Follow the simple instructions provided.</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="center" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD align="center" valign="top">provided.</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="center" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="center" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<!-- End Table Body -->
</TABLE>
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>If you vote your proxy by Internet or by Telephone, please do NOT mail back your Proxy Card.</B>
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 8pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Signature(s) in Box</B>
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 8pt; margin-top: 6pt">Please sign exactly as your name(s) appears on Proxy. If held in joint tenancy, all persons should
sign. Trustees, administrators, etc. should include title and authority. Corporations should
provide full name of corporation and title of authorized officer signing the Proxy.
